snippet.title: Oquonie, a puzzle game
snippet.description:
You can purchase the game here:
https://hundredrabbits.itch.io/oquonie

Oquonie is a textless puzzle game for PC & Linux created in collaboration with illustrator Rekka Bellum where you must find your way across an intertwined megastructure. You will not be alone, your incarnations will have the help of bizaroid characters speaking an obscure language.

Thx for watching!
-Rek & Dev

EDIT: In 2023 we released a new version, see it here: https://100r.co/site/oquonie.html

🐇About: https://100r.co
🐇Support: https://100r.co/site/support.html
🐇Our tools & games: https://hundredrabbits.itch.io
